description: An ancient tomb located in the capital of Arabasta Kingdom, Alubarna, containing the tombs and graves of past kings of Arabasta. The tomb also houses the Arabasta Poneglyph containing information about the ancient weapon Pluton.

keyEvents.title: Robin Forces Cobra to Reveal Poneglyph Location
keyEvents.description: Nico Robin forces King Cobra to lead her to the Tomb of the Kings where the Poneglyph is hidden.

keyEvents.title: Robin Uses Treinta Fleur
keyEvents.description: Robin demonstrates her Devil Fruit abilities within the tomb.

keyEvents.title: Robin Uses Strangle Technique
keyEvents.description: Robin uses her Strangle technique in the tomb.

culturalSignificance: The tomb has been protected by the Nefertari royal family for generations, serving as the resting place for Arabasta's kings and the guardian of dangerous historical knowledge.
notableFeatures: Houses information about the ancient weapon Pluton
Protected by royal family for generations

description: The royal palace of Arabasta located in the capital city Alubarna, where the Nefertari family resides and governs the kingdom.

keyEvents.title: Water Luffy Technique Debut
keyEvents.description: Luffy debuts his Water Luffy technique during his fight with Crocodile at the palace.

keyEvents.title: Ground Secco Technique Debut
keyEvents.description: Crocodile uses Ground Secco to turn the palace garden into wasteland.

keyEvents.title: Ground Death Technique Debut
keyEvents.description: Crocodile uses Ground Death at the palace.

keyEvents.title: Luffy Loses Second Round Against Crocodile
keyEvents.description: Luffy is defeated by Crocodile for the second time at the palace.

culturalSignificance: The seat of power for the Arabasta Kingdom and home of the Nefertari royal family.

statusHistory.description: Palace gardens turned to wasteland by Crocodile's abilities

notableFeatures: Connection to the Tomb of the Kings

description: The capital city of the Arabasta Kingdom, where the final battle of the civil war takes place and where Crocodile planted a massive time bomb.

keyEvents.title: Straw Hats Search for the Bomb
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hat crew frantically searches Alubarna for the massive time bomb planted by Crocodile.

culturalSignificance: The capital and political center of Arabasta Kingdom.

statusHistory.description: City threatened by massive time bomb and civil war
